name: GEtherBridge
description: This contract serves as a useful bridge between ETH and the WETH ERC-20 based gTokens. It accepts deposits/withdrawals in ETH performing the wrapping/unwrapping behind the scenes.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Accepts a deposit to the gToken using ETH. The gToken must have WETH as its reserveToken. This is a payable method and expects ETH to be sent; which in turn will be converted into shares. See GToken.sol and GTokenBase.sol for further documentation.

functionDecorators.name: depositUnderlying
functionDecorators.description: Accepts a deposit to the gcToken using ETH. The gcToken must have WETH as its underlyingToken. This is a payable method and expects ETH to be sent; which in turn will be converted into shares. See GCToken.sol and GCTokenBase.sol for further documentation.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Accepts a withdrawal to the gToken using ETH. The gToken must have WETH as its reserveToken. This method will redeem the sender's required balance in shares; which in turn will receive ETH. See GToken.sol and GTokenBase.sol for further documentation.

parameterDecorators.name: _grossShares
parameterDecorators.description: The number of shares to be redeemed.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawUnderlying
functionDecorators.description: Accepts a withdrawal to the gcToken using ETH. The gcToken must have WETH as its underlyingToken. This method will redeem the sender's required balance in shares; which in turn will receive ETH. See GCToken.sol and GCTokenBase.sol for further documentation.

parameterDecorators.name: _grossShares
parameterDecorators.description: The number of shares to be redeemed.
